description:
Gourmet Corp. invades the Cooking Fest as Komatsu is groping around in the dark for his Darkness Cooking Duel with Zaus! Will the beginning of the final tournament also be its end?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Outbreak of War! Gourmet Corp.`s Fierce Full-Scale Offensive!
開戦! 美食會, 激烈の総攻撃!!
